jobs_results.title: SharePoint Consultant
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a SharePoint Consultant for an ongoing project with an IT Services Company in Singapore. This role will be a permanent opportunity with the client.

Salary: Open for discussion

Location: Central Singapore

Primary Duties and Responsibilities
• Your responsibilities include building solutions, with an emphasis on Microsoft technology-centric solutions;
• Work closely with project managers and clients to understand and manage expectations, as well as participate in the implementation and test effort.
• You will be responsible for developing and supporting web-based applications in an object-oriented environment.
• You will support existing applications used by the client as well as develop technical documentation, provide support to team members and clients, and test software applications to ensure quality and functionality.
• You will also participate in design meetings, analyze and research software requirements to determine the feasibility of design and marketing... requirements within time and cost constraints. This includes analysis of software upgrades.

Required Experience
• Development experience in SharePoint 2010, 2013, 2016
• Experience in Microsoft SharePoint Development, Configuration, and Administration
• Experience using .NET Framework, particularly C#, ASP.NET
• Experience in handling Microsoft SharePoint version upgrade preferred.

Interested, please send over your resume to [Click Here to Email Your Resume] or call at 67087429 for a confidential discussion

jobs_results.title: Consultant, IT Security (BB-40F8F)
jobs_results.description: Description Position at Trustwave Trustwave is a leading cybersecurity and managed security services provider that helps businesses fight cybercrime, protect data and reduce security risk. Offering a comprehensive portfolio of managed security services, security testing, consulting, technology solutions and cybersecurity education, Trustwave helps businesses embrace digital transformation securely. Trustwave is a Singtel company and the global security arm of Singtel, Optus and NCS, with customers in 96 countries. Role Responsibilities:Point of contact to assist and advise client for any ICT security relatedLead and support customer in the matter of security incident response and resolutionTeam player with good leadership qualitiesCustomer-focused with good interpersonal skillsManage, configure and upgrade a wide variety of security technologies (e.g. FW, UTM, IDS/IPS, SWG/SEG, VPN, EPP, DLP, ATP, 2FA, PAM, etc.)Respond managed security technologies fault alerts and/or customer... escalationUse strong fundamental knowledge (e.g. TCP/IP) and product-specific knowledge to perform troubleshooting on common technical issues on the managed security technologiesPerform escalation to internal product domain experts and/or external product vendorsWork with internal experts/external vendors to resolve technical issues Prepare Incident Reports on high severity incidentsRespond to inbound Change Requests (CRs), Service Requests (SRs), Queries on managed security technologies, in a timely manner (within stipulated SLA).Perform regular configuration backups on managed security technologiesPlan and coordinate Maintenance Windows with customer on necessary software patching and version upgrades. Create and update technical documentations on managed security technologiesGenerate monthly reports according to service scope requirementsAdhere to policies, procedures and security best practicesResolve problems independently and understand escalation procedurePreferred:Bachelor’s degree / Polytechnic Diploma in Computer Science, Information Technology or Information SystemAt least 5 years’ working experience in IT Infrastructure Operation and/or SupportSound fundamental knowledge on IP networking (e.g. TCP/IP, routing, etc.) and operation systems (e.g. Windows, Linux, etc.)Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills and a passion for information securityFluent communicator in both written and spoken English; Good interpersonal skillsTechnical Skills & Expertise: Profession certification and/or practical working expertise on some/most the below security technologies:RSA / SafeNet (2FA)Cisco ASA / CheckPoint /Fortinet / Palo Alto / SonicWall / AlgoSec Mgt (Firewall))Trend Micro / McAfee (NIPS / HIDS / NSM)CyberArk / BeyondTrust (PAM)Symantec BlueCoat / McAfee Web GatewayDSM (AV, HIPS, Host FW, etc)Container SecurityImperva (DAM / CounterBreach)Tripwire EnterpriseAWS / MS Azure (Cloud)Candidate to indicate his/her certification status and number of years of experience on the above list of technologies in his/her application.Education:We prefer college-educated applicants, but at minimum, high school diploma or equivalent is required for employment.Trustwave is an Equal Opportunity Employer of Minorities, Females, Protected Veterans, and Individuals with Disabilities.To All Agencies:Please, no phone calls or emails to any employee of Trustwave outside of the Talent Acquisition team. Trustwave’s policy is to only accept resumes from agencies via the Trustwave Agency Portal. Agencies must have a valid fee agreement in place and they must have been assigned the specific requisition to which they submit resumes, by the Talent Acquisition team. Any resume submitted outside of this process will be deemed the sole property of Trustwave and in the event a candidate is submitted outside of this policy is hired, no fee or payment of any kind will be paid

jobs_results.title: Financial Consultant
jobs_results.description:
财务顾问

Join us as a Financial Consultant in Millennial Group. Grow your career and achieve work-life balance!

Are you happy with your current job? Are you earning enough to fulfil your dreams?

Can you imagine yourself continuing your current job for the rest of your life?

What you will achieve: Living your dreams and taking charge of your life. Making a difference in the lives of others.

Advancement:

• Internationally recognised certification in financial planning. Eg: CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™, CHARTERED FINANCIAL CONSULTANT®

• Leadership role - Recruitment and coaching of Financial Consultants, source for new business opportunity, strategise business opportunities, running of agency unit, management of clients and financial consultants.

• Insurance agency ownership.

Responsibilities and Duties:

a) Provide financial advisory services to clients to help them meet their financial goals.

b) Plan and execute insurance planning solutions for clients. Review and monitor... solutions to fulfil their financial / life goals.

c) Client services relationship.

d) Involve in marketing and Facebook campaigns.

e) Lead generation.

Pre-Requisite:

1. Singaporean Citizen / PR.

2. Minimum 21 years old. (Regulatory Requirement)

3. Full certificate in GCE ‘A’ Level, International Baccalaureate Diploma qualification, diploma awarded by a polytechnic in Singapore or equivalent. No experience required.

Remuneration / Incentive:

• Allowance starting from $1,000 to $5,000 a month + Full commission*

• Yearly Incentive Trip*

• Earned Commission Bonus*

• Quarterly Bonus* (Productions)

• Renewal Bonus*

• Incentive Challenge*
• Terms and conditions apply

Speak to us to learn more and request for an interview. We are more than happy to have you join our family.

Job Types: Full-time, Commission, Permanent.

Millennial Group a group of agency units of Prudential Assurance Company Singapore (Pte) Ltd Reg. No. 199002477Z

420/15Jul21

jobs_results.title: Recruitment Consultant
jobs_results.description:
This position is responsible for the start to end cycle of the recruitment process involving both client and candidate management through series of close follow ups leading to successful sales negotiation and job placement fulfilment.

Responsibilities:

· Provide total recruitment solutions to clients’ staffing needs.

· Liaise with key stakeholders on their staffing needs

· Provide advice and solutions to stakeholders’ queries on their recruitment needs

· Source for candidates via job portals and by any other means

· To attract, select and present quality candidates who match the specific recruitment needs of our clients.

· Coordinate interviews between candidates and clients.

· To manage and retain good candidates.

· Manage offers and ensure smooth onboarding for new hires

· Regular client visits to build and maintain strong relationship with clients

· Other recruitment related duties

Requirement:

· A Diploma education in any discipline

· Minimum 1 year of recruitment... experience is preferred

· CEI certification is an advantage.

· Strong working knowledge of staffing techniques and labour regulations.

· Possess a high degree of diplomacy and tact in managing issues and difficult situations.

· To be actively involved in a highly dynamic and fast-paced work environment.

· Excellent communication and relationship building skills.

· To be pro-active and take initiative

jobs_results.title: Machine Safety Consultant (remote support for projects at Indo)
jobs_results.description:
• Working location: Jakarta (MNC company)
• Industry: Automation
• At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field
• Required to have Safety Certification TUV FSEngineer
• Attractive Remuneration with good benefits (depending on experience)
Machine Safety Specialist/ Consultant will provide leadership for Safety Services offerings, as well as delivering safety assessments, verification, validation and remediation.
Responsible for proposing and delivering safety consulting services.
Machine Safety Certification from TUV Rheinland (or other equivalent organizations) is highly desireableREQUIREMENTS:
- BS Degree in Engineering or equivalent experience.
- Safety Certification TÜV FSEngineer is required.
- Preferably 5 years experience in machine safety consulting or discrete manufacturing safety engineering
- Knowledge and firsthand experience in working with safety legislation, e.g. OSHA, IEC, ISO, EN Safety standards (61508, 62061, 13849, etc.), or equivalents.
... Experience in LOTO & Harzadous Energy Control
Competency:
1. Demonstrated ability to propose and present consulting projects. Strong understanding of machine safety in a manufacturing environment required.
2. Demonstrated understanding of discrete manufacturing processes, automation design and integration.
Successful candidate should possess strong capability in driving a disciplined process, holding individuals and themselves accountable for results.
3. Self-started and capable of working with minimal supervision.
4. Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
5. Demonstrates time management skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities.
6. Understanding of financial statements and ability to generate financial justification and ROI calculations for projects required.Customer/Partner Focus: comprehending the needs and requirements of customers or business partners to provide them with strategic value.
Energy, passion, commitment, and integrity.
Strong knowledge of the industrial services marketplace is required.
Strong commercial skills must be present to interact at all levels of the organization.
Ability to understand the technology in order to provide the most effective support.
Ability to convey concepts and ideas to the team, while fostering a sense of ownership and innovation.
Ability to communication and interact effectively across all levels of the organization.
Ability to present and communicate effectively to a large audience.
Ability to develop relationships of trust and confidence with CSM business groups and key stakeholders within Sales, Control Products and Solutions, and Architecture and Software.
Demonstrates good judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solutions.
Due to pandemic period, candidates will be required to work remotely until further notice when needed to travel for clients' visits.
Salary will commensurate with experience. Attractive salary package + benefits will be offered

Interested candidates, please submit your detailed resume (attached with recent photograph) stating your current & expected salary and availability in MS WORD format to jenny.lee@jmcsg.com

jobs_results.title: Consultant, Systems
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
NCS is a leading information and communications technology (ICT) and communications engineering services provider across the Asia-Pacific region. We are headquartered in Singapore and a wholly owned subsidiary of the Singtel Group. We have in-depth domain knowledge and unique capabilities that create business value for customers. We offer a broad range of services, including consulting, systems development and integration, business process outsourcing, infrastructure management and solutions, and technology solutions.
As a Senior Consultant, Systems, the broad area of your job responsibilities will cover the following:
• Manage system changes through change request process & provide status reports to the relevant parties.
• Respond promptly to incidents, investigate & provide temporary &/or permanent resolution of incidents escalated. Provide timely status updates to relevant parties and management.
• Monitor & measure the performance & availability of systems proactively; implement... corrective actions identified to improve performance & availability.
• Monitor and adhere to the agreed service levels, document & maintain the configuration of the systems; provide regular reporting to relevant parties.
• ITIL Foundation certified, familiar with ISO 9001/ISO 27001 and participated in system audits.
• Ensure systems always comply with security policies, including vulnerability assessment, patching, and hardening.
• Lead team members to identify, research, and resolve technical problems
• Regular 8x5 support but required to be on standby for 7x24 support. Expected to work during off-peak hours on system activities
• Knowledge of Hyper Converged Infrastructure architectures.
• Experience in hypervisor, software defined network, software defined storage, cloud orchestration and automation, NGFW, storage and backup.
• Knowledge of HA clustering and middleware products such as application servers and web servers
• Proficient in coordinating and communicating customer requirements

The ideal candidate should possess:
• Minimum Diploma/Degree in Computer Information Systems or related field.
• Minimum 5-6 years of relevant working experiences
• Must Possess ITIL v3 Foundation Certification
• Good knowledge in UNIX/Linux system OS administration
• Knowledge of cloud operations and virtual technologies
• Ability to prioritize effectively and work with a sense of urgency
• Effectively communicates with teammates and managers
• BCP/DR(Business Continuity Plan/Disaster Recovery) System OS recovery process
• Good team player/leader and self-starter
• Excellent troubleshooting skills
• Experience in shell scripting
• Good UNIX/LINUX Server Administration ability
• IBM RHEL, AIX and Oracle Solaris OS Certification/ Training preferred

jobs_results.title: Sap Provider Systems Responsible Consultant
jobs_results.description:
About Job

CTC Undisclosed Job Location Singapore Experience 10 - 15 yrs

Description

Technical skills (Required - Mandatory) Hands on experience in
Application: SAP Basis, NetWeaver, ABAP/Java-Stack, SAP PI/PO, Avantra, ServiceNow, SAP LaMa

Capacity & Performance Management / Tuning, Proven experience in delivering... Automations, Service Improvements Area
Certification: Certified in SAP Basis or SAP HANA

Technical skills (Required - Nice to have) Application: SAP Solution Manager
Database: Sybase, MSSQL
Technical: Underlying Infrastructure stack: Hypervisor, Storage, Network, Job Management Tool (SAP BPA/Redwood RunMyJobs, Broadcom/Automic UC4, SAP BPO/Solution Manager, IBM Workload Automation), CISM, Automation implementation experience in SAP Basis

Language skills needed Role (L1/L2/L3/Service Lead/Tech Lead/Architect)

People skills Supporting and mentoring the L1, L2 and L3 Team in day-to-day work.
Leading a team of 5-10 or 10 persons.

Soft skills Experience in running operations with ITIL processes / ITIL certified.
Excellent Analytical and troubleshooting skill.
Excellent in Verbal, written communication.
Creative thinking in implementing Service improvements (automation, incident reduction, etc.).
Willingness and flexibility to learn new technologies, scale up quickly and adapt to different roles as the situation demands.
Experienced in running operations following ITIL processes.
Strong multi-tasking skills and abilities to handle changing priorities in a fast paced environment
Strong customer focus and management of client expectations
Should work with minimum supervision
High customer orientation
High quality awareness

50 Role (L1/L2/L3/Service Lead/Tech Lead/Architect) Skill Level

As a PSR, you are an expert at contributing to different phases of the consulting lifecycle.
Plan and coordinate all activities within the responsible SAP Environment of the System Responsible
You will plan and coordinate Changes with IT Partners, Application Teams and other Services within the Datacenter.
Manage and support multiple landscapes. Should be able to manage and work in the area of SAP operation support, Implementation support, rollouts and Project support.
Be the single point of contact for the different landscape for internal Teams as well for the Customer.
Proven SAP systems delivery and/or system administration knowledge across the suite of major SAP applications & versions.
You will escalate Issues and Risks to the appropriate Team / Management.
You will support the L1 / L2 / L3 Team in troubleshooting Incidents.
You will optimize the SAP Systems in your responsibility.
You will review the monthly EWA Reports, create proposals and discuss them with the IT Partners and Application Teams.
You will be intensely involved in; defining the problem, propose, coordinate and refining the solution.
You will also play an important role in the development, configuration and deployment of the overall solution.
You will guide teams on project processes, deliverables and contribute to the proposal development, client training and internal capability-building and help detail the project scope.
You will have the opportunity to shape value-adding consulting solutions that enable our clients to meet the changing needs of the global landscape.

Expert

Writing solutions / estimates for RFPs.
Driving automation using state-of-art automation platforms like SaltStack PSR

jobs_results.title: Principal SAP HR Consultant
jobs_results.description:
We're looking for a candidate to fill this position in an exciting company.

To support, manage and provide technical solution to SAP Modules HR/e-HR/Payroll Perform configuration change to SAP modules according to business requirements Provide SAP Functional (HR/e-HR/Payroll) configuration to accommodate design requirements Provide functional consultancy and support to end-users requirements Assist in troubleshoot operational issues Work with infrastructure team to ensure SAP system uptime of ( 99% Ensure ERP system complies with SOX security requirement A Degree qualification in a relevant discipline Certified SAP Consultant in HR/Payroll is preferred At least 8 years of relevant experiences in SAP environment and has done at least 2 full SAP implementation cycle Understand overall SAP R/3 features and functionalities Experience in Success Factor would be a PLUS Able to lead SAP implementation projects in areas such as process analysis, design, prototype/implementation... system/report interface, testing, conversion, user testing and post-production support Knowledge in Software Development Life Cycle Process Skill in developing basic ABAP programs Skill in Business Process mapping

jobs_results.title: Talent Acquisition Consultant [Internship]
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

Have you ever wondered what the hiring process for companies was like?

Are you open to networking and establishing connections between firms and talents in the legal industry?

Do you want to make an impact and change someone’s course of life?

Join us and discover more on the behind-the-scenes of a legal recruitment firm!

In this 3-month internship, together with a team of other recruiters, you are responsible for the end to end recruitment cycle process.

A hands-on experience and steep learning curve guaranteed!

What can you take away from us?
• How to source for the right talent using both traditional and creative recruiting methods and resources
• How to provide staffing solutions and manage talent pipeline to meet the needs of the business units
• A more comprehensive understanding of the legal industry
• Improved interpersonal and networking skills
• How to be resourceful and efficient as we manage, prioritize and close talent searches against a timeline
• A... real insight into, and personal experience with corporate life – life as a legal recruitment consultant

Responsibilities of a legal recruiter:

Recruitment
• To actively source for potential candidates for different legal placements via many channels
• Communicating with professionals in the legal industry who hold managerial roles and above

Administrative
• Posting of job advertisements
• Data entry and documentations
• Updating and maintenance of documents

Our Preferred Skills:
• Driven, resourceful and self-motivated
• Ability to work creatively and calmly under pressure
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• A detail-oriented, data-driven mentality
• A cheerful and positive mindset
• Well-versed in Microsoft Office

Requirements:
• Minimum ‘A’ Level Certification
• Minimum 3 months commitment

Join our team of highly passionate, driven and warm staff at Recruit Legal today!

Interested applicants may contact Claire at legal@searchasia.com.sg

Claire Lin

@ Lin Xiuxin

EA License No:. 16S8107

EA Personnel Registration No:.R1103711

www.recruit-legal.com

jobs_results.title: GRC Security Consultant
jobs_results.description: Company Description Passionate about cybersecurity and helping customers protect and modernize their digital infrastructure? We are looking for a GRC (Governance Risk and Compliance) and Security Consultant to join our team in Singapore. S/he will have expertise 1- GRC with exposure to regulatory projects (Payment Act, PDPA, GDPR, PCI-DSS, AML/KYC, MAS TRM) 2- Cybersecurity domain knowledge with CISM and or CISSP certification and practical expertise in protecting sensitive data with relevant and proven security measures and controls and processes 3- Project Management expertise (PMP or Prince 2 certified) Portfolio: consulting, solution integration and (Security Operating Center) managed services . Why LINKBYNET? LINKBYNET is celebrating its 21th birthday this year. Proud of a ~25% CAGR growth since its inception, it is now a 100M euro revenue multi-national company (HQ in France) with more than 800 clients and almost 1000 Linkies. Established in Asia since 2014, we are providing... managed services in Singapore, Hong-Kong SAR, mainland China and Vietnam. We help our clients consolidate/modernize their data-centers, migrate to the hybrid (public/private) cloud, adopt security best practices and build (DevOps-based) software factories. Our ITIL-certified teams manage clients infrastructure from Vietnam, China, Mauritius, France and Montreal. We are looking for a professional individual with +5 years of consulting experience with domain knowledge and expertise in GRC and Cybersecurity in order to: 1- Formulate infosec objectives and roadmap 2- Establish policies, processes and procedures in line with local and international regulations 3- Verify the security compliance posture against the regulations and standards and derive a security implementation plan for remediation 4- Develop security awareness and culture 5- Establish a risk management framework and conduct risk assessment with relevant risk rating matrix 6- Participate in operations and projects initiatives and activities from a cybersecurity perspective 7- Lead in the incident and crisis management response activities Job Description We are looking for a professional individual with +5 years of consulting experience with domain knowledge and expertise in GRC and Cybersecurity. 1- Formulate infosec objectives and roadmap 2- Establish policies, processes and procedures in line with local and international regulations 3- Verify the security compliance posture against the regulations and standards and derive a security implementation plan for remediation 4- Develop security awareness and culture 5- Establish a risk management framework and conduct risk assessment with relevant risk rating matrix 6- Participate in operations and projects initiatives and activities from a cybersecurity perspective 7- Lead in the incident and crisis management response activities Qualifications · BSc/MSc in Computer Science or equivalent · +5 years of experience in the Cybersecurity area · Previous experience in a customer facing role such as consultant · Experience in regulatory projects with expertise in MAS TRM, PS act, PDPA, GDPR, PCI-DSS, AML/KYC · Able to lead, influence, train, coordinate Licenses/Certifications required · Security certifications · ISMS lead auditor · ISMS risk assessment/audit/implementation · CISM/CISSP/OSCP/WSCP/CEH · PMP/Prince2 · Scrum Master Critical knowledge & skills including tools, software applications, language, etc. · JIRA/CONFLUENCE · AWS/AZURE · SAP Commerce · MIRAKL · ADOBE CMS · FLUENT or any order fulfillment system · API knowledge (design, build, run) · Good English skills Additional Information The company places a lot of importance and truly embodies values like innovation, humility, collaboration, sense of excellence and respect of commitments. Linkbynet positions itself as a premium customer and people-centric IT services company
